isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CHASSIS ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Trailer Connection

svcsubproc.title: At Back of Cab
svcsubproc.para: From connector (12), circuits LT TURN and RT TURN are fed to the trailer socket. From connector (78), circuits TAIL and MARKER are fed to the trailer socket. From connector (160), circuits STOP and AUX are fed to the trailer socket. The ground circuit is fed to the trailer socket from the front and rear cab ground.

svcsubproc.title: At Back of Sleeper Box
svcsubproc.para: From connector (12) circuit LT TURN is fed through connector (707) to circuit 56B and the trailer socket (149). Also, from connector (12), circuit RT TURN is fed through connector (707) and circuit 57B to the trailer socket (149). From connector (78), circuit TAIL is fed through connector (707) and circuit 68 to the trailer socket (149). Also, from connector (78), circuit MARKER is fed through connector (707) and circuit 58J to the trailer socket (149). From connector (160), circuit STOP is fed through connector (707) and circuit 70G to the trailer socket (149). Also, from connector (160), circuit AUX is fed through connector (707) and circuit 72B to the trailer socket (149). The ground circuit is fed to the trailer socket from the sleeper ground bolt.

svcsubproc.title: Frame Mounted Socket, Tractor or Truck With Trailer Connections
svcsubproc.para: From connector (183), circuit 58E is fed through connector (13) and circuit MARKER to the trailer socket. Also, from connector (183), circuit 70H is fed through connector (13) and circuit STOP to the trailer socket.

From connector (182), circuit 71C is fed through connector (13) and circuit AUX to the trailer socket. Also, from connector (182), circuit 68D is fed through connector (13) and circuit TAIL to the trailer socket. Also, from connector (182), circuit 57E is fed through connector (13), and circuit RT TURN to the trailer socket. Also, from connector (182), circuit 56E is fed through connector (13) and circuit LT TURN to the trailer socket. The ground circuit is fed to the trailer socket from the cab ground.

svcsubproc.title: Frame Mounted Socket, Truck Application With Air Brakes
svcsubproc.para: From connector (183), circuit 58E is fed through connector (13) and circuit MARKER to the trailer socket. Also, from connector (183), circuit 70H is fed through connector (13) and circuit STOP to the trailer socket.

From connector (182), circuit 71C is fed through connector (13) and circuit AUX to the trailer socket. Also, from connector (182), circuit 68D is fed through connector (13) and circuit TAIL to the trailer socket. Also, from connector (182), circuit 57E is fed through connector (13) and circuit RT TURN to the trailer socket. Also, from connector (182), circuit 56E is fed through connector (13) and circuit LT TURN to the trailer socket. The ground circuit is fed to the trailer socket from the cab ground.
